channel.title: How do I change item colors in 508's?
channel.description: Is it the same way as 317?

item.title: How do I change item colors in 508's?
item.dc:creator: @Chrisofwow Chrisofwow
item.description:
@Chrisofwow wrote:

Zillionair1:

As far as i know, customs in 503+ are impossible.[/quote][quote=“Zillionair1, post:2, topic:258552”]As far as i know, customs in 503+ are impossible.

Are you stupid? of course they are possible. It’s just the same as adding a model on a 317 client but with different variables.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change item colors in 508's?

item.title: How do I change item colors in 508's?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Diehard508, post:13, topic:258552”]Rofl, for all of you that said 503+ is impossible, how do you explain armor?
You honestly dont thing that jagex makes a bronze platebody, then makes an iron platebody right?

They made the bronze, and recolored to silver and changed stats for this new item
All in good time, things will be figured out. If you’ve noticed, 317 is over 4 years old.
I started playing runescape at that time, and it looked like it. Then after a month of playing, jagex started making some graphics updates ^.^

Maybe tx or somebody will figure it out and release to you noobs that post in the wrong section and need to be spoonfead[/quote]Why T X. Some random person could come a program something. T X Isn’t the smartest person in the world.
But your right about the Jagex thing.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change item colors in 508's?

item.title: How do I change item colors in 508's?

item.description:
@Diehard508 wrote:

Rofl, for all of you that said 503+ is impossible, how do you explain armor?
You honestly dont thing that jagex makes a bronze platebody, then makes an iron platebody right?

They made the bronze, and recolored to silver and changed stats for this new item
All in good time, things will be figured out. If you’ve noticed, 317 is over 4 years old.
I started playing runescape at that time, and it looked like it. Then after a month of playing, jagex started making some graphics updates ^.^

Maybe tx or somebody will figure it out and release to you noobs that post in the wrong section and need to be spoonfead

item.source: How do I change item colors in 508's?

item.title: How do I change item colors in 508's?
item.dc:creator: @starhooper starhooper
item.description:
@starhooper wrote:

zyle1992:

It doesn’t work that way. One, the values in the 317 weren’t static. Now they are. We didn’t find out how change colors until about 467(or maybe even later). That’s 150 client revision. So if we go at the same pace, the client willl have to be on version 658 before we figure out how to change colors on the 508.

stop speaking bullshit i already have custom items working, only downside is we cant import models yet so its pretty pointless atm, item recolouring is very possible. I can already change the model zoom, model rotations, names and a lot more. Its all about finding the variables to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change item colors in 508's?

item.title: How do I change item colors in 508's?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

It doesn’t work that way. One, the values in the 317 weren’t static. Now they are. We didn’t find out how change colors until about 467(or maybe even later). That’s 150 client revision. So if we go at the same pace, the client willl have to be on version 658 before we figure out how to change colors on the 508.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change item colors in 508's?

item.title: How do I change item colors in 508's?
item.dc:creator: @starhooper starhooper
item.description:
@starhooper wrote:

if yo[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:258552”]No, you can’t do it yet. Partly because no one knows the ints, and partly because now, everything is static, which makes tracing things in the client almost impossible. Eventually, we may be able to. but for now, not possible. Think about it this way. We found out how to recolor and add custom models after about 150 client revisions.[/quote]

if you want the variables just compare the read values to a 317, it seriously is the same just a lot more messy

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change item colors in 508's?

item.title: How do I change item colors in 508's?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

No, you can’t do it yet. Partly because no one knows the ints, and partly because now, everything is static, which makes tracing things in the client almost impossible. Eventually, we may be able to. but for now, not possible. Think about it this way. We found out how to recolor and add custom models after about 150 client revisions.

Read full topic
